#summary This page provides a listing of Use Cases for the COLORE System.

= COLORE System Use Cases =

  * [Uc9786CreateNewClText UC9786: Create a new CL text]
  * [Uc3467RetrieveListingOfAllClTexts UC3467: Retrieve a listing of all CL texts]
  * [Uc5377RetrieveMostRecentVersionOfClText UC5377: Retrieve most recent version of a CL text]
  * [Uc8204RetrieveVersionOfClText UC8204: Retrieve a version of a CL text]
  * [Uc8388DeleteAllVersionsOfClText UC8388: Delete all versions of a CL text]
  * [Uc9742DeleteVersionOfClText UC9742: Delete a version of a CL text]
  * [Uc2892DeleteMostRecentVersionOfClText UC2892: Delete the most recent version of a CL text]
